title: How To Train German Shepherds : 2nd Edition (Revised) : Breed Specific Training Techniques For Effective Discipline, Socializing, Obedience Training, Leash ... And Potty Training (Sam's Pet Books Book 1)
features: is back for 2012 - totally rewritten, extended and updated, and now an Amazon Bestseller!

The German Shepherd dog is easily one of the most widely accepted and recognized breeds of dog anywhere in the world. This classically beautiful breed of dog is known for its amazing versatility. Coupled with extreme intelligence, a German Shepherd is capable of assuming many different roles, including:

... and many more besides! A German Shepherd dog is characterized by its superior intelligence, high curiosity, boundless energy, versatility and regal good looks. These clever dogs can be very easy to train and can seem almost eager to learn new tricks and ways of pleasing its owner at very young ages, right up to very advanced ages. However, as intelligent and easy to train as they might seem, there are times when some German Shepherd dog owners may begin to feel frustrated and impatient when they don't see much success with their efforts. This can happen when your training methods don't take into consideration what's important to your dog and what makes him want to obey you the most. In this best selling title from the author of The Healthy Homemade Dog Food Recipe Book, you will learn:
Is a German Shepherd Dog Right for You?
Is a German Shepherd Dog Right for You?
How to Stop Your Dog Biting and Chewing
How to Stop Your Dog Biting and Chewing
Don't delay - scroll up and press 'Buy Now' today!
description: '...excellent Shepherd specific training tips...this book focuses on positive reinforcement...'
'...a great book for anyone wanting to know how to train and get the most from their German Shepherd...'
'...If you're thinking about getting a German Shepherd then you definitely need to get this book...'
'...a perfect introduction to this wonderful breed...'
'...If you have German Shepherd, or considering getting one, DON'T PASS THIS UP...'
'...Buy this book if you have or are considering a German Shepherd...'

Sam Hannigan is, and always has been, somewhat animal mad. He lives in Baltimore, Maryland with his ever expanding menagerie of purchased and rescued animals. At the last count he had 4.5 dogs of varying breeds (the 0.5 is a tiny Italian Greyhound), an indeterminate amount of cats (some are his, and some are locals that come to visit and occasionally stay for the hospitality), two ball pythons, a smattering of rats and a variety of free range chickens. He is only popular with his neighbors due to the organic eggs he shares.
